Consider a domain where only the following relations can exist between any two entities:

{{headquarters}}
{{has type}}
{{has spouse}}
{{has occupation}}
{{has education}}
{{has genre}}
{{from country}}
{{has author}}
{{event year}}
{{has parent}}
{{birth place}}
{{organization has founder}}
{{located in}}
{{no relation}}
{{organization leader}}
{{is member of}}
{{organization has member}}
{{movie has director}}

Given the following examples,

Statement: {{Volodymyr Barilko (Ukrainian: Володимир Володимирович Барілко; born 29 January 1994) is a retired professional Ukrainian football striker. Barilko is a product of the Metalist Kharkiv Youth School System.}}
{{birth-place}} best describes the relation between {{Volodymyr Barilko}} and {{Kharkiv}}

Statement: {{Arthur Herzog III (April 6, 1927 – May 26, 2010) was an American novelist, non-fiction writer, and journalist, well known for his works of science fiction and true crime books.}}
{{has-genre}} best describes the relation between {{Arthur Herzog III}} and {{true crime}}

Statement: {{Kalyaniyin Kanavan (English: Kalyani's Husband) is a 1963 Indian Tamil film, directed and produced by S. The film stars Sivaji Ganesan and B. Saroja Devi in lead roles, M.}}
{{starring}} best describes the relation between {{Kalyaniyin Kanavan}} and {{B. Saroja Devi}}

Statement: {{All the Beautiful Things is a 2014 American documentary film written and directed by John D. Harkrider.}}
{{movie-has-director}} best describes the relation between {{All the Beautiful Things}} and {{John D. Harkrider}}

Statement: {{The People's Movement for Progress (, MPP) " Roch Marc Christian Kaboré à la tête d'un nouveau parti d'opposition " , Jeune Afrique, 26 January 2014 . ".}}
{{org-leader}} best describes the relation between {{People's Movement for Progress}} and {{Roch Marc Christian Kaboré}}



Déclaration: {{modifier Aarre Merikanto est un compositeur et pédagogue finlandais, né à Helsinki (Finlande) le 29 juin 1893, décédé au même lieu le 28 septembre 1958.}}


Quelle relation décrit le mieux la relation entre {{Aarre Merikanto}} et {{Helsinki}}
